Infer the date from context.

Q: Today is Christmas Eve of 1937. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 12/14/2026
(B) 12/14/1950
(C) 12/14/2007
(D) 12/14/1937
(E) 07/14/1938
(F) 12/14/1988
A: (D)

Q: Tomorrow is 11/12/2019. What is the date one year ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 09/04/2018
(B) 11/11/2018
(C) 08/25/2018
(D) 11/02/2018
(E) 11/04/2018
A: (B)

Q: Jane and John married on Jan 2, 1958. It is their 5-year anniversary today. What is the date tomorrow in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 01/11/1961
(B) 01/03/1963
(C) 01/18/1961
(D) 10/14/1960
(E) 01/03/1982
(F) 12/03/1960
A: (B)

Q: The first day of 2019 is a Tuesday, and today is the first Monday of 2019. What is the date one year ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 01/08/2018
(B) 01/07/2018
(C) 01/02/2018
(D) 01/12/2018
(E) 05/07/2017
(F) 10/29/2017
A:

Q: The target grid has a full row of Xs in the second row and a full column of Xs in the fourth column. The first row has Xs in the first, second, and fourth cells, and the third row has Xs in the first, second, and fifth cells. The bottom row has Xs in the first, third, and fifth cells. In the second row, the first cell is empty, and in the third row, the fourth cell is empty. In the fourth row, the second cell is empty, and in the fifth row, the second cell is empty. What is the date of the target grid in the form of a 5x5 grid with Xs and empty cells?
Answer: second||
